Nick Jonas Has His Eye On Ben Affleck's Role As Batman & The Internet Is In Splits!
Nick Jonas Has His Eye On Ben Affleck's Role As Batman & The Internet Is In Splits!
Ben Affleck has almost confirmed in a tweet that he is not playing the iconic role in Matt Reeves' directorial The Batman, which will release on June 24, 2021. And fans are heartbroken.
popsugar-assets.com
While they are still trying to process what has happened, they are also wondering who will replace him in the Warner Bros movie. Meanwhile, Priyanka Chopra’s husband Nick Jonas has expressed that he wants to play Ben Affleck, and fans, including us, don’t even know what to say.
After the news of Ben Affleck quitting the Batman movie broke, everyone was speculating as to who should/can step into his shoes. A publication called HypeBeast also asked fans the same question.
To this, Nick Jonas replied, “First name Nick. Last name Jonas.”
